price: Ìyẹn nítorí pé, dájúdájú wọ́n kórira ohun tí Allāhu sọ̀kalẹ̀. Nítorí náà, (Allāhu) sì ba iṣẹ́ wọn jẹ́.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَرِهُواْ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فَأَحۡبَطَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahum karihū mā anzala al-lahu fa-aḥbaṭa aʿmālahum
